name: Get Witchy (Majikeyric)
description:
A game for Commodore 64 (PAL/NTSC)

Created for the  Halloween Game Dev Competition 2019

(c) 2019 Digital Monastery  (Hokuto*Force Game Developing Division)

Programming by Eric Hilaire aka Majikeyric

Graphics by Federico Sesler aka Raffox and Austin East

Sound by Esteban Palladino aka Uctumi

Aditionnal sfx by Gaetano Chiummo

Original game concept by Austin East

The game

Get Witchy is a single button game where you take control of a witch on her broom flying in the skies during halloween, avoid baddies and collect maximum candies to beat the high score.

Controls

Use joystick in port 2 : hold fire to dive and release to launch.

Use F1 during game to turn music ON/OFF

Good luck!
